ACCOUNT.TITLE: Portfolio
WALLET_SETUP.TITLE: Setup Wallet
REGISTER.TITLE: Create Wallet
CREATE_WALLET_DISCLAIMER.TITLE: Information
CREATE_WALLET_DISCLAIMER.TEXT: PLEASE BE VERY CAREFUL WITH YOUR MNEMONIC KEY. THIS ADVICE IS GENERAL IN NATURE AND IS NOT LEGAL OR FINANCIAL ADVICE.
MNEMONIC_SHOW.TITLE: Your wallet backup
SETTINGS.RESET_TEXT: Reset all wallet data. Please make sure you have the wallets backup words.
SETTINGS.RESYNC_TEXT: Force the wallet to resync all transactions and balance data.
IMPORT_WALLET_ERROR_MESSAGE: Error importing wallet. Please check input and try again.
IMPORT_WALLET_CONNECTION_MESSAGE: Error verifying wallet. Please try later.
ERROR_SEND_TEXT: Could not create the transaction. Please check your input and try again.
MNEMONIC_CONFIRM_TEXT: In order to make sure you recorded the backup words correctly you can now arrange the words in the right order.
BACKUP_WORDS_BACKED_UP_TEXT: Confirm that you have written down your backup words
BACKUP_WORDS_CONFIRM_SKIP_TEXT: Are you sure you want to continue without confirming the backup words of your wallet?
BACKUP_WORDS_WRITE_DOWN_TEXT: Please write down the following words on a piece of paper. You will need them in order to restore the wallet. It is very important that you keep them safe and private. Dont show them to someone.
SETTINGS.WORDS_TEXT: Your mnemonic words that correlate to your private key
SET_PIN_FIRST: Please set up a pincode first
IMPORT_WORDS_TITLE: Two ways to enter your backup words
LIGHT_WALLET_INFO_TEXT: Please be aware that myetpwallet.com does not have access to your wallet keys. If you loose your backup words or key file, and we will not be able to grant access to your funds.
MESSAGE.LOGOUT_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to logout?
SUCCESS_SEND_TEXT: Transaction has been sent to the network. Please wait for confirmations. You transaction hash is:
IMPORT_MNEMONIC_TEXT: A wallet file will be created for you. This file will enable you to access your wallet.
BACKUP_WORDS_WRITE_DOWN_TEXT: Please write down the following 24 words on a piece of paper. You will need them in order to retrieve the wallet. It is very important that you keep them safe and private. Dont show them to someone.
RESET_MESSAGE: All login data will be cleared
LOGIN_MENU_INFO_TEXT: Notice for existing MVS wallet users: On your first login to myetpwallet.com, please create a wallet file from backup words and then open the wallet from the file.

DISCLAIMER.HEADLINE: Disclaimer
DISCLAIMER.INTRODUCTION: This light wallet is developed based on blockchain technology design. All account information and transaction activity is stored on public blockchains. The wallet service provider will not store users’ wallet private keys, mnemonics or backup words (collectively, “private key information”)  in any centralized database. Users’ private key information and files generated through importing private keys belong solely to the person who created the wallet account. The user bears the responsibility to safeguard his/her private key files and password and is solely responsible for the use of his/her account, password and private key information.
DISCLAIMER.LIST_INTRODUCTION: You agree that the wallet service provider will not bear any responsibility in the following situations:
DISCLAIMER.LIST_ITEM_1: Leaks of personal information due to the user having made known his wallet password/private key information to others, the user not having safeguarded his/her password/private key information, the user having shared his/her wallet account, or any other mistakes that are not committed by the wallet service provider.
DISCLAIMER.LIST_ITEM_2: The use of this service involves internet services and may be affected by unstable connections. The use of this service entails the risk of service disruptions or services being unable to meet the demands of users due to the following: events of force majeure, malware, viruses and other malicious software, attacks by hackers, unstable operating systems, users’ geographical location, users shutting down their devices and other reasons related to the Internet, technology and telecommunication lines. Users must understand and undertake the above risks. The wallet service provider will not be responsible for any consequences resulting from the use of this service.
DISCLAIMER.LIST_ITEM_3: The use of asset transfer services is based on users having sufficient knowledge about the counterparty (including but not limited to the counterparty’s real-world identity). There is no way to recall, revoke or undo asset transfers once they have been executed. Users will undertake all risks resulting from the use of asset transfer services once they have executed a transfer. The wallet service provider shall have no legal responsibility for any disputes that arise due to asset transfers. These disputes will be resolved by the sending and receiving parties.
DISCLAIMER.LIST_ITEM_4: The service provider only provides technical support for the wallet and will not provide technical support for any other service.
DISCLAIMER.READ_AND_AGREE: I have read and agree to the entire disclaimer and voluntarily undertake the risks and responsibilities communicated.

LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.TITLE: Legal disclaimer
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.BRIEF_EXPLAIN: MyETPWallet.com makes it easy for you to create, save, and access your information and interact with Blockchain. We are not responsible for the management of your funds and you are the sole person responsible for the security of your own funds.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.WARNING: Before using this wallet, please be aware that there are important risks associated with cryptocurrency and blockchain-based open-source software such as large exchange rate fluctuations and bugs.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.I_TITLE: I. Accessing and Controlling Wallet Information
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.I_INFO: The Wallet does not collect the customer’s private information, such as your password and the private keys. The Development Team is responsible for guaranteeing wallet access and fix bugs. When accessing your account, we strongly advise you to back up the wallet files beforehand to best protect your property rights.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.II_INFO_1: 2.1 The Metaverse Team will implement various kinds of security techniques and programs to protect the customers against data loss, inappropriate use, unauthorized access and/or disclosure. For example, we implement high-standard encryption techniques such as SSL to protect your personal information. Please be advised that no matter how strong the current security measures are, a 100% information security cannot be guaranteed due to limitations of technology and unforeseeable hostile actions against the platform. By using our service, the customer acknowledges the possibility that the system and telecommunication network they use to access our service can be compromised, which is out of our control. For instance, the software the customer has downloaded or websites visited may contain viruses or malwares that threaten the security of the wallet information. Therefore, it is imperative that the customers ensure the security of their personal information and data. The development team recommended customers to pay special attention to back up password and private keys offline (e.g. writing them on a piece of paper).
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.II_INFO_2: 2.2 Under no circumstances should customers trust information originating from non-official sources. Any wallet operation should only take place after the customer has completed due diligence and assessed the counterparty’s identity.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.II_INFO_3: 2.3 It is the sole responsibility of the customer to protect their wallet security. The developers from the Metaverse Team will take appropriate technical measures that are in accordance with industry standards to protect the data security on the customers’ device but are not legally responsible of any data or funds loss. In those circumstance, the customer acknowledge and agree that the Metaverse Team does not guarantee the complete safety of the wallet funds.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.III_INFO: Should you have any question regarding the privacy policies above, please contact us using the following email address: info@mvs.org
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.FOOTER: The Metaverse Team reserves the right to interpret and change the aforementioned clauses, which are under the protection of the MIT open source protocol.

PASSWORD_WARNING: We advise you to use a strong password for your own security.
NOTICE_TRANSACTION_FEE_UNCOVERED: Please make sure that you have enough ETP to cover the transaction fee.
